name: Seraphina Ignis
title: The Ember-Hearted

features.title: Draconic Resilience
features.desc: Your hit point maximum increases by 3. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC equals 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

features.title: Metamagic: Careful Spell
features.desc: When you cast a spell that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, you can protect some of those creatures from the spell's full force. Spend 1 sorcery point and choose a number of those creatures up to your Charisma modifier. A chosen creature automatically succeeds on its saving throw against the spell.

features.title: Metamagic: Empowered Spell
features.desc: When you roll damage for a spell, you can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll a number of the damage dice up to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one). You must use the new rolls.

features.title: Hellish Resistance
features.desc: You have resistance to fire damage.

equipment: A dagger, an arcane focus (a small crystal that faintly glows), a disguise kit, a dungeoneer's pack, and a pouch with 15 gp.

personality.traits: Flattery is my preferred trick for getting what I want. I lie about almost everything, even when there's no reason to.
personality.ideal: Fairness. I will not lie to or cheat an honest person.
personality.bond: I owe everything to my mentorâ€”a horrible person who's probably rotting in jail somewhere.
personality.flaw: I'm convinced that no one could ever fool me the way I fool others.

spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.desc: Ranged spell attack deals 1d10 fire damage.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.desc: You create one of several minor magical effects.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.desc: Create a spectral, floating hand that can manipulate objects.

spells.name: Minor Illusion
spells.desc: Create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.desc: Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DEX save. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save.

spells.name: Charm Person
spells.desc: You charm a humanoid you can see. It regards you as a friendly acquaintance.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.desc: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.
